samples.instruction: Two-wheeler-kku pillion rider helmet kattaayamaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. Driver and pillion rider iruvarukkum ISI marked helmet kattaayam. Fine: Rs.1,000 + 3 months license suspension (repeat offence). Children-kkum helmet venum. Fashion helmets not acceptable.

samples.instruction: Will illaamal irandhaal property yaarukku pogum?
samples.current_output: Hindu Succession Act padi: Class I heirs (wife, sons, daughters, mother) samamaaga pangu peruvaargal. Class I illaattal Class II (father, siblings, etc.). Muslim-kku Shariat law, Christian-kku Indian Succession Act apply.

samples.instruction: Cognizable vs Non-cognizable offence enna vithiyaasam?
samples.current_output: Cognizable: Serious crimes (murder, rape, theft, assault) - Police FIR pottu warrant illama arrest pannalam. Non-cognizable: Minor crimes (defamation, cheating under Rs.500) - Court permission venum. NC case-kku NCR (Non-Cognizable Report) padhivu seivaargal.

samples.instruction: Property vaangum mun ennenna documents check pannanum?
samples.current_output: Must check: 1) Title deed chain (30 years), 2) EC (30 years), 3) Patta & Chitta, 4) Survey sketch, 5) Tax paid receipts, 6) Approved building plan, 7) NOC (if apartment), 8) RERA registration (new projects), 9) Power of Attorney (if applicable). Lawyer verification recommended.

samples.instruction: Children parents-ai paarkaama vittuttaanga - law udhavumaa?
samples.current_output: Maintenance and Welfare of Parents Act 2007: Children (including married daughters) parents-kku maintain seyyanum. Tribunal: SDM/Tahsildar level. Maintenance order: Rs.10,000/month max. Property revocation: Gift deed cancel possible if neglect proved.

samples.instruction: Vehicle fitness certificate à®à®ªà¯à®ªà¯‹à®¤à¯ à®µà¯‡à®£à¯à®®à¯?

samples.instruction: Revenge porn/intimate images share panninaal enna punishment?
samples.current_output: IT Act 66E: 3 years imprisonment + Rs.2 lakh fine. 67/67A: 5-7 years imprisonment. IPC 354C (voyeurism). Women: Section 499/500 defamation. Platform takedown: CERT-In report. Victim support: NCW helpline 7827-170-170. Don't blame victim - legal protection undu.

samples.instruction: Bank account freeze aachu, yen? Enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Freeze reasons: 1) Court order (loan default, legal case), 2) IT department notice, 3) Suspicious transactions (PMLA), 4) KYC not updated. Steps: 1) Bank-kitta freeze reason kelunga (writing-la), 2) Court order = lawyer consult, 3) IT matter = CA consult, 4) KYC = documents update pannunga. Wrongful freeze: Banking Ombudsman complaint.

samples.instruction: Children-kku safe internet usage tips enna?
samples.current_output: Parents: 1) Parental controls enable, 2) Screen time limits, 3) Open communication, 4) Monitor (not spy) activity, 5) Teach about online dangers. Children: Don't share personal info, stranger-kitta chat vendaam, uncomfortable content-a parents-kitta sollunga.

samples.instruction: Neighbour veettu construction en veetukku damage - compensation kidaikkumaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. Civil Court-la damages claim. Steps: 1) Written notice to neighbour, 2) Photos/videos of damage, 3) Engineer report (damage assessment), 4) Civil suit file. Compensation: Repair cost + inconvenience. Injunction to stop work-um possible.

samples.instruction: Restaurant-la food poisoning aanaal case podalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. 1) Medical report vaangunga (treatment evidence), 2) Food Safety Officer-kku complaint, 3) Consumer forum case, 4) Serious case - Police complaint (IPC 269, 270). Medical expenses + compensation kidaikkum. Restaurant license suspend/cancel aagalam.

samples.instruction: Senior citizen pension apply à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Eligibility: 60+ years, BPL/low income. Schemes: IGNOPS (Rs.1,000/month), TN Old Age Pension (varies). Apply: e-Sevai centre, Taluk office. Documents: Age proof, income certificate, Aadhaar, bank account. Widow pension: Additional scheme available.

samples.instruction: Wedding hall booking cancel, advance à®¤à®¿à®°à¯à®®à¯à®ª à®¤à®°à®², legal action?
samples.current_output: Depends on: 1) Cancellation policy in agreement, 2) How early cancelled, 3) Reason for cancellation. Rights: 1) Unreasonable forfeiture = challenge à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®²à®¾à®®à¯, 2) Hall's fault (double booking, not available) = full refund + compensation, 3) Consumer Forum: Unfair trade practice claim. Force majeure (COVID type): Special consideration. Always get cancellation policy in writing!

samples.instruction: Builder common area handover vaangaama irukku - enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: RERA-la complaint podunga - builder conveyance deed execute seyyanum endru order vaangalam. 50%+ flats occupied aanaal association form panni legal notice anuppunga. Non-compliance-kku penalty, imprisonment provisions undu.

samples.instruction: Fake news share panninaal legal trouble varumaa?
samples.current_output: Yes, possible: IPC 505 (public mischief), 153A (promoting enmity), Epidemic Diseases Act (health misinformation). IT Rules 2021: Platforms must remove fake news. Knowingly spreading = higher liability. Before sharing: Verify from trusted sources. Fact-check websites use pannunga.

Arrears + future maintenance à®•à¯‡à®Ÿà¯à®•à®²à®¾à®®à¯. Don't delay - act immediately.

samples.instruction: Job fraud - advance vaangittu mosam pannitaanga
samples.current_output: Complaint: 1) cybercrime.gov.in, 2) Local police FIR, 3) Labour Department (if company involved). Legal sections: IT Act 66D (cheating using computer), IPC 420 (cheating). Red flags: Advance fee, unrealistic salary, gmail/yahoo recruiter. Legitimate companies never ask money.

samples.instruction: Marriage-kku minimum age enna?
samples.current_output: Penn - 18 years, Aan - 21 years. Underage marriage illegal (Child Marriage Restraint Act). Underage marriage voidable (annul seyyalam). Parents/guardians-kku 2 years imprisonment + Rs.1 lakh fine. Marriage fix pannuravarkalum liable.
